searchSql.baseSql:
SELECT RCDATA.ELOANCODE, RCDATA.RISKTYPE, RCDATA.ELOANPKID, RCDATA.SERVICECODE, RCDATA.FINORGCODE, RCDATA.CUSTOMERNAME, RCDATA.EXECUTORID, SYSU0.REAL_NAME AS EXENAME, RCDATA.EXECUTORTEAMID, RCDATA.EXECUTORDISTID, ORG.ORG_NAME, RCDATA.EXETIME, RCDATA.RCEXEID AS RCEXEIDSTR, SYSU1.REAL_NAME AS RCEXENAME FROM (SELECT RCCITEM.ECODE AS ELOANCODE, RCCITEM.RTYPE AS RISKTYPE, RCCITEM.EPKID AS ELOANPKID, RCCITEM.SRVCODE AS SERVICECODE, RCCITEM.FOCODE AS FINORGCODE, RCCITEM.CNAME AS CUSTOMERNAME, RCCITEM.EXEID AS EXECUTORID, RCCITEM.EXETEAM AS EXECUTORTEAMID, RCCITEM.EXEDIST AS EXECUTORDISTID, RCMGC.CREATE_TIME AS EXETIME, RCMGC.CREATE_BY AS RCEXEID FROM (SELECT RCC.ELOAN_CODE AS ECODE, RCC.RISK_TYPE AS RTYPE, RCC.PKID AS RCID, ELOAN.PKID AS EPKID, ELOAN.LOAN_SRV_CODE AS SRVCODE, ELOAN.FIN_ORG_CODE AS FOCODE, ELOAN.CUST_NAME AS CNAME, ELOAN.EXCUTOR_ID AS EXEID, ELOAN.EXCUTOR_TEAM AS EXETEAM, ELOAN.EXCUTOR_DISTRICT AS EXEDIST FROM sctrans.T_RC_RISK_CONTROL AS RCC JOIN sctrans.T_TO_ELOAN_CASE AS ELOAN ON RCC.ELOAN_CODE = ELOAN.ELOAN_CODE) AS RCCITEM JOIN sctrans.T_TO_RC_MORTGAGE_CARD AS RCMGC ON RCCITEM.RCID = RCMGC.RC_ID
UNION
SELECT RCCITEM.ECODE AS ELOANCODE, RCCITEM.RTYPE AS RISKTYPE, RCCITEM.EPKID AS ELOANPKID, RCCITEM.SRVCODE AS SERVICECODE, RCCITEM.FOCODE AS FINORGCODE, RCCITEM.CNAME AS CUSTOMERNAME, RCCITEM.EXEID AS EXECUTORID, RCCITEM.EXETEAM AS EXECUTORTEAMID, RCCITEM.EXEDIST AS EXECUTORDISTID, RCFR.EXECUTE_TIME AS EXETIME, RCFR.CREATE_BY AS RCEXEID FROM (SELECT RCC.ELOAN_CODE AS ECODE, RCC.RISK_TYPE AS RTYPE, RCC.PKID AS RCID, ELOAN.PKID AS EPKID, ELOAN.LOAN_SRV_CODE AS SRVCODE, ELOAN.FIN_ORG_CODE AS FOCODE, ELOAN.CUST_NAME AS CNAME, ELOAN.EXCUTOR_ID AS EXEID, ELOAN.EXCUTOR_TEAM AS EXETEAM, ELOAN.EXCUTOR_DISTRICT AS EXEDIST FROM sctrans.T_RC_RISK_CONTROL AS RCC JOIN sctrans.T_TO_ELOAN_CASE AS ELOAN ON RCC.ELOAN_CODE = ELOAN.ELOAN_CODE) AS RCCITEM JOIN sctrans.T_TO_RC_FORCE_REGISTER AS RCFR ON RCCITEM.RCID = RCFR.RC_ID
UNION
SELECT RCCITEM.ECODE AS ELOANCODE, RCCITEM.RTYPE AS RISKTYPE, RCCITEM.EPKID AS ELOANPKID, RCCITEM.SRVCODE AS SERVICECODE, RCCITEM.FOCODE AS FINORGCODE, RCCITEM.CNAME AS CUSTOMERNAME, RCCITEM.EXEID AS EXECUTORID, RCCITEM.EXETEAM AS EXECUTORTEAMID, RCCITEM.EXEDIST AS EXECUTORDISTID, RCMG.CREATE_TIME AS EXETIME, RCMG.CREATE_BY AS RCEXEID FROM (SELECT RCC.ELOAN_CODE AS ECODE, RCC.RISK_TYPE AS RTYPE, RCC.PKID AS RCID, ELOAN.PKID AS EPKID, ELOAN.LOAN_SRV_CODE AS SRVCODE, ELOAN.FIN_ORG_CODE AS FOCODE, ELOAN.CUST_NAME AS CNAME, ELOAN.EXCUTOR_ID AS EXEID, ELOAN.EXCUTOR_TEAM AS EXETEAM, ELOAN.EXCUTOR_DISTRICT AS EXEDIST FROM sctrans.T_RC_RISK_CONTROL AS RCC JOIN sctrans.T_TO_ELOAN_CASE AS ELOAN ON RCC.ELOAN_CODE = ELOAN.ELOAN_CODE) AS RCCITEM JOIN sctrans.T_TO_RC_MORTGAGE AS RCMG ON RCCITEM.RCID = RCMG.RC_ID) AS RCDATA
LEFT JOIN sctrans.SYS_USER AS SYSU0 ON RCDATA.EXECUTORID = SYSU0.ID LEFT JOIN sctrans.SYS_ORG AS ORG ON RCDATA.EXECUTORDISTID = ORG.ID LEFT JOIN sctrans.SYS_USER AS SYSU1 ON RCDATA.RCEXEID = SYSU1.ID
WHERE 1=1
<ifNotNull sEloanCode> AND RCDATA.ELOANCODE LIKE '%'+#sEloanCode#+'%' </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull sEloanRiskType> AND RCDATA.RISKTYPE = #sEloanRiskType# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull sEloanChooseRole> <if test="sEloanChooseRole == 0"> <if test="sEloanName != ''"> AND SYSU0.REAL_NAME LIKE '%'+#sEloanName#+'%' </if> </if> <if test="sEloanChooseRole == 1"> <if test="sEloanName != ''"> AND SYSU1.REAL_NAME LIKE '%'+#sEloanName#+'%' </if> </if> <if test="sEloanChooseRole == 2"> <if test="sEloanName != ''"> AND RCDATA.CUSTOMERNAME LIKE '%'+#sEloanName#+'%' </if> </if> </ifNotNull>
<if test="sStartTime != ''"> AND RCDATA.EXETIME >= #sStartTime# </if> <if test="sEndTime != ''"> AND RCDATA.EXETIME <= #sEndTime# </if>
<ifNotNull sExeTeam> AND ORG.ORG_NAME like '%'+#sExeTeam#+'%' </ifNotNull>
<choose> <when test="USER_JOBCODE=='GeneralManager' "> AND 1=1 </when> <when test="USER_JOBCODE=='director' "> AND RCDATA.EXECUTORDISTID = #orgId# </when> <when test="USER_JOBCODE=='Manager' "> AND RCDATA.EXECUTORTEAMID = #orgId# </when> <when test="USER_JOBCODE=='consultant' "> AND RCDATA.EXECUTORID = #userId# </when> <when test="USER_JOBCODE=='JYFKZY' "> AND RCDATA.RCEXEID = #userId# </when> <when test="USER_JOBCODE=='JPKZG' "> AND 1=1 </when> <otherwise> AND 1=0 </otherwise> </choose>
